mealSet.name: Burger Combo
desc: For more conservative customers, we have our traditional Burger Combo meal.
You can order an upgraded version for $1.00 more with 20% less fat and 45.6% more doubts. Not available Ã  la carte.
lore: 'My kingdom for a burger!'
~ Rich Ardiii

mealSet.name: MultiBurger (TM)
desc: Order your very own customized MultiBurger (TM) today. Each layer consists of a (post) - succulent beef steak with (once) fresh cheddar cheese, with (suspiciously) crunchy lettuce and tomato at the top.
NOTE: Nutrition values and cost values above are given per layer of burger. Add $1, 20 calories, 5 g of carbohydrate for the lettuce and tomato.
Comes as 3 layers when ordered by delivery, un-negotiable.
lore: 'We are many, we are one.'
~ Rescue Heroes: The Movie

mealSet.name: PizzaCake
desc: Fusing two traditional favorites - the pizza and the cake, we get the PizzaCake!
It is a wonderful meal that you spend as long as you like eating, don't feel guilty about, and then suddenly you remember you have to pay taxes!
Studies have also shown it reduces waistlines by 5 cm*.
lore: '62-35-35-35, PizzaCake Delivery!' (Disclaimer: not a valid phone number)
~ Anonymous

mealSet.name: Many-Flavored Meat Slab
desc: Savor meat every time - in different flavors. Mmmm, the southwest bottom corner tastes like onion and banana juice. The northeast bottom corner tastes like cabbages!
Experience a surprise every bite. Perfect for all you meat lovers!
Special thanks goes to our suppliers in the biotech industry for providing us all these wonderful meat at budget costs.
lore: 'One man's meat is another man's poison.'
~ Adage originating in 1576

mealSet.name: Low Sodium Diet (TM)
desc: Feeling a little salty about some things? Resolve all those salt with our very Low Sodium Diet (TM)!
DISCLAIMER: Contrary to some... uh... popular rumors, our patented LSD(TM) should not contain any drugs. Any similarities in name is purely coincidental.
lore: 'Na, we don't eat no sodium here!'
~ A customer who wished to be only identified as 'Mr. Shore'

mealSet.name: PSY(R) Shroom Sandwich
desc: After the latest fan craze about the Korean celebrity PSY, one of his fans suggested that we create a burger in honor of him.
And so we did! Our shroom burger is now adorned with black... food coloring in the shape of sunglasses.
NOTE: Any disparity in mushroom color can be safely ignored.
lore: 'I'm a mother father gentleman!'
~ PSY

mealSide.name: Amurican Cheeckun Fuudes
desc: Ever needed that boost of calories and fat? Don't fret, try the authentic taste of Amurica in this bucket!
lore: Get y'all kicks from dis awesom thang!

mealSide.name: Fried Chicken Oreos
desc: Literally a nugget in a biscuit!
lore: AMAZING CHICKEN WING COOKIES, BABY!

mealSide.name: Mega Fries
desc: Mmm... tasty, mouthwatering fries. Made from somewhat freshly harvested potatoes and near-oceanic salt only.
lore: 'I believe you speak French?' ~ Host
'Yes, french fries and french toast!' ~ Maury

mealSide.name: Fresh Lemon Fruit
desc: When life brings you down...
And you can't help but get emo...
Don't fret, MekDoornels is here to settle your low self-esteem!
Just return the lemon you bought to us, and we will accept it free of charge!
Then, you will feel a great deal more *ahem* confident!
Don't get (EVEN MORE) sour though, there is plenty for everyone!
NOTE: Ignore the label on the side and the wiring at the ends, it is merely decoration that is edible.
lore: 'When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back!
Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with them?
Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons!
Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down. With the lemons!
I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!'
~ Cave Johnson

mealSide.name: Asparagus Ice Cream
desc: Many delightful things are green, such as this ice cream!
DISCLAIMER: Not our fault if your face turns green. Not to be confused with Asperger's Syndrome.
lore: 'Asparagus is love, asparagus is life. Oh, and so is ice cream.'
~ Mr. X

drinks.name: Purple Drank
desc: Purple Drank [sic] is a inspirational and thought-provoking drink.
A must-drink before any important events such as national examinations and career interviews.
It also cures any acute coughing problems.
Yah, bro.
lore: 'Roses are red, Violets are blue. Purple drank is purple, Wait, violets aren't blue.'
~ Gammer Gurton's Garland

drinks.name: Moonshine
desc: Tapped from our lunar industries, we bring you the freshest moonshine of Planet Earth.
Moonshine is an enjoyable drink that provides infinite entertainment when consumed with friends.
You can purchase our Mid-Autumn Festival special edition too! (Whilst Stocks Last)
lore: 'MY NAME IS FR***IN MOON MOON. I'D BE THE MOST RETARDED WOLF.
"OH SH** WHO BROUGHT F**KING MOON MOON ALONG?" '
~ Kitchki (Tumblr)

drinks.name: Chum Bucket
desc: MekDoornels supports the A-Less Foundation by providing buckets of chum to whoever wants to consume it or perform the Chum Bucket Challenge.
Bathrooms are available on site.
Credits to 9-year-old Bobby who suggested it to us, saying that he thought of it 'all by himself'.
lore: 'omg!11!1!one!11 i thought of dis gr8 drink u shuld ad! its call chum bucket.'
~ Bobby, via email suggestions

drinks.name: Water (500ml)
desc: Deliciously flavored water from our suppliers off the coast of Fukushima Prefecture. Mmm, tasty water!
Served to you in a glass made from glass from... uh... high-risk trading on the Colombia River near Washington State.
(Note: water has been observed to glow faintly green in the dark. This is perfectly normal and safe).
lore: Two scientists walk into a bar.
Scientist 1: 'I would like a glass of H2O.' (water, for our non-science-oriented customers)
Scientist 2: 'I would like a glass of H2O too!'

drinks.name: Snake Blood
desc: After Professor A. P. W. B. Dumbledore discovered the 12 usages of dragon blood, we have decided to incorporate the magical properties of snake blood (a similar animal as discussed by Chinese homeopathic authorities) into our meal design.
lore: 'No snakes were harmed in the making of this drink. I promise!'
~ Our supplier, OPHIDIOPHOBIA-CORP
